name: .MSKN File Extension
summary: Learn about .MSKN files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Theme, or skin, that defines the look and feel of MediaMonkey, a program for organizing and playing music files; contains interface settings for the title bar, status bar, buttons, tabs, and checkboxes.

content: The default MediaMonkey skin file is named "Theme.mskn," which can be edited with the KSdev theme editor.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
